text: OfficeMax is an American office supply retailer and subsidiary of Office Depot currently headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida. Like Office Depot, They sell office supplies like printers and computers in the United States. It was merged with Office Depot in 2013. It was founded in 1988. The first OfficeMax store opened at the Golden Gate Shopping Center in Mayfield Heights in 1988. OfficeMax opened its first stores in Mexico in 1996. It has since grew to hundreds of locations in the United States and Mexico. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1988 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Florida Category:Companies based in Ohio Category:Companies based in Illinois
title: OfficeMax
